title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: (i) This Order may be cited as the National Minimum Wage Order
text_raw:
1. 

(i) This Order may be cited as the National Minimum Wage Order
text_norm: 1 (i) order may cited national minimum wage order

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: (ii) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2023.
text_raw:
2022. 

(ii) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2023.

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for
text_raw:
2. 

It is hereby declared that the national minimum hourly rate of pay for 
the purposes of the National Minimum Wage Acts 2000 and 2015 shall be 
€11.30.
text_norm: 2 hereby declared national minimum hourly rate pay purpose national minimum wage act 2000 2015 shall eur11.30

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: 3. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following
text_raw:
3. The national minimum hourly rate of pay may include the following 

allowances: 

(i) 

for board only, €1.01 per hour worked 

(ii) 

for lodgings only, €26.70 per week, or €3.81 per day. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 October 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [500] 3

title: Act 2015 (No. 22 of 2015)) of the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 (No. 5
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order sets the national minimum hourly rate of pay from 1 January 2023 
at €11.30, and the board and lodging rates as follows; 

Lodgings: €26.70 per week, or €3.81 per day. 

Board: €1.01 per hour worked. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [500]
